Articles.Content:
Geez this went from "Ohh cool new models!" To "WE MUST REVAMP THE WHOLE GAME!!!" Everyone is looking at each part individually when it's all about what you do with those parts. No one launches just a fuel tank do they? The combination of all these parts to make a craft is what's important.

I have nothing against any of the parts in the game, or the comedy, or style, personally, though if fuel tanks from Jeb's Junkyard look better than a HUGE company's (rokomax) then MAYBE we need a SLIGHT change. Or mods. MODS.
Will these ever make a Comeback? I know that the people managing KSP right now aren't the people who made it but surely they must want to do something like this

Squad has recently presented some art for the DLC new parts, that show that textures can be toggleable. This feature plus the new parts are a good reason to finish the part revamp that was originally planned for the 1.2 version.

 

The real question is "does it extend to base-game parts?"
I'm highly doubtful we'll see an art pass until KSP2.

DISCLAIMER: What follows is my personal opinion to which people are free to agree with or repudiate at his or her discretion. My opinion represents exactly that. My opinion.

To be perfectly blunt, with KSP now in TT2's um... hands, I have no faith or hope or expectation to see the art pass ever happen. I simply do not believe they care enough to unify the graphics in such a way. I hope I am wrong I really do. Time will tell.
